ca.nejedly.portlet.mail
Class GotMailPortlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.portlet.GenericPortlet
      ca.nejedly.portlet.mail.GotMailPortlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.portlet.Portlet, javax.portlet.PortletConfig
public class GotMailPortlet
extends javax.portlet.GenericPortlet

GotMail portlet class - provides information about the user's inbox folder, e.g., number of unseen messages, total message count, etc.

Author:
Zdenek Nejedly znejedly@uoguelph.ca
See Also:
GotMail

checkMail

public void checkMail(javax.portlet.RenderRequest request,
                      javax.portlet.RenderResponse response,
                      boolean retrieveCountsOnly)
               throws javax.portlet.PortletException,
                      java.io.IOException
Gets the user's uid and password, check user's mail, stores the results in the request.
